turns.text: Are are we paying too much in taxes and are we getting what we pay for Whats your opinion
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Well its kind of broad subject uh I I think there are some areas where we where we uh pretty well you know get our moneys worth but I I also think there are lot of areas especially in uh big government federal government uh where were short changed Uh lot of money spent for uh things that are not used and uh I was I was in the Air Force and I was at there were there was equipment at every base I was ever on that was just going to waste It was just sitting and rusting and you know and -
turns.label: sv

turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah and I I think that uh its tone of our times that politicians uh are into themselves more than they are into you know doing something worthwhile for the people they represent which is really unfortunate
